results.title: Metformin adherence is associated with lower risk of osteoporotic fracture among patients with advanced type 2 diabetes.

results.title: The effects of metformin and alendronate in attenuating bone loss and improving glucose metabolism in diabetes mellitus mice
results.text_hl: Conclusion: The combined use of @CHEMICAL_Alendronate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019386 @@@alendronate@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has an anti-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ and anti-@<m>DISEASE_Osteoporotic_Fractures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058866 @@@osteoporotic@@@ effect compared with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, but they appear to act no obvious synergistically between @CHEMICAL_Alendronate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019386 @@@alendronate@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Metformin accelerates bone fracture healing by promoting type H vessel formation through inhibition of YAP1/TAZ expression
results.text_hl: This study aimed to investigate the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on the healing of @<m>DISEASE_Osteoporotic_Fractures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058866 @@@osteoporotic@@@ as well as normal @DISEASE_Fractures_Bone @DISEASE_MESH:D050723 @@@fractures@@@.

results.title: The associations of sodium-glucose cotransporter-2 inhibitors versus dipeptidyl peptidase-4 inhibitors as add-on to metformin with fracture risk in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: AIM: To investigate whether @GENE_SLC5A2 @GENE_6524 @@@sodium-glucose cotransporter-2@@@ (@GENE_SLC5A2 @GENE_6524 @@@SGLT2@@@) inhibitor use as compared to dipeptidyl peptidase-4 (DPP-4) inhibitor use as add-on to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is associated with the risk of any @DISEASE_Fractures_Bone @DISEASE_MESH:D050723 @@@fracture@@@ or @DISEASE_Epilepsy_Tonic_Clonic @DISEASE_MESH:D004830 @@@major@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Osteoporotic_Fractures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058866 @@@osteoporotic fractures@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Osteoporotic_Fractures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058866 @@@MOFs@@@).

results.title: Metformin attenuates diabetic osteoporosis by suppressing ferroptosis via the AMPK/Nrf2 pathway.
results.text_hl: Background: Ferroptosis is a critical factor in the impairment of osteoblast function in @DISEASE_Osteoporosis @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@osteoporosis@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@), a @CHEMICAL_Biguanides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001645 @@@biguanide@@@ antidiabetic drug, has demonstrated anti-@<m>DISEASE_Osteoporotic_Fractures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058866 @@@osteoporotic@@@ effects and has been confirmed to exert therapeutic benefits in @DISEASE_Osteoporosis @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@diabetic osteoporosis@@@ (@DISEASE_Osteoporosis @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@DOP@@@).

citations.NLM: Liu Y, Fu Z, Wang X, Yang Q, Liu S, Zhu D. Metformin attenuates diabetic osteoporosis by suppressing ferroptosis via the AMPK/Nrf2 pathway. Front Pharmacol. 2025;16():1527316. PMID: 40206070

results.title: The bone-protective benefits of kaempferol combined with metformin by regulation of osteogenesis-angiogenesis coupling in OVX rats.
results.text_hl: Overall, this study demonstrates the positive effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ combined with @CHEMICAL_kaempferol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C006552 @@@Kae@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Osteoporotic_Fractures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058866 @@@osteoporotic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ by promoting osteogenesis-angiogenesis coupling, suggesting their potential application in @DISEASE_Osteoporosis @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@postmenopausal osteoporosis@@@.

results.title: Cellular senescence by loss of Men1 in osteoblasts is critical for age-related osteoporosis.
results.text_hl: Loss of @GENE_MEN1 @GENE_4221 @@@Men1@@@ induces cellular senescence via mTORC1 activation and @GENE_PRKAA1 @GENE_5562 @@@AMPK@@@ suppression, rescued by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment. In @GENE_BMP1 @GENE_649 @@@bone morphogenetic protein@@@-indued bone model, loss of @GENE_MEN1 @GENE_4221 @@@Men1@@@ leads to accumulation of senescent cells and @<m>DISEASE_Osteoporotic_Fractures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058866 @@@osteoporotic bone formation@@@, which are ameliorated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Integration of Bone-Targeted Delivery and Crosstalk Modulation of Liver-Bone Axis for Improved Osteoporosis Therapy.
results.text_hl: The delivered agents directly modulate osteoblasts, osteoclasts, and osteocytes, promoting bone formation and inhibiting bone resorption to counteract @<m>DISEASE_Osteoporotic_Fractures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058866 @@@osteoporotic bone loss@@@.
